values.content:
You are a real estate email parser. Given an incoming email, extract structured data.

Return ONLY valid JSON with these fields:
{
  "client_name": "Full name of the sender",
  "client_email": "sender email",
  "client_phone": "phone if found, or null",
  "subject": "email subject line",
  "body": "the main message body, cleaned up",
  "category": "one of: price_only, inspection, multi_question, other",
  "property_address": "property address if mentioned, or null",
  "source": "REA if from realestate.com.au, Domain if from domain.com.au, otherwise Email",
  "is_inspection_request": true/false,
  "is_offer_intent": true/false
}

Category rules:
- price_only: Only asking about price/price guide
- inspection: Requesting or mentioning inspection/viewing
- multi_question: 2+ distinct questions
- other: Everything else (offers, general interest, etc.)

If you can't determine a field, use null.

You are an AI assistant for a real estate agent. Write a professional, warm reply to the enquiry below.

Rules:
- Keep it under 100 words
- Be friendly but professional
- If they asked about price, include the price guide if available
- If they asked about inspection, offer to arrange one
- Sign off with the agent's name (use "the team" as placeholder)
- Do NOT make up information — only reference what's in the email
- Australian English spelling

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "agent_email": "{{ $env.AGENT_EMAIL || 'REPLACE_WITH_AGENT_EMAIL' }}",
  "client_name": "{{ $('Parse AI Response').item.json.client_name }}",
  "client_email": "{{ $('Parse AI Response').item.json.client_email }}",
  "client_phone": {{ $('Parse AI Response').item.json.client_phone ? '"' + $('Parse AI Response').item.json.client_phone + '"' : 'null' }},
  "subject": "{{ $('Parse AI Response').item.json.subject }}",
  "body": {{ JSON.stringify($('Parse AI Response').item.json.body) }},
  "category": "{{ $('Parse AI Response').item.json.category }}",
  "property_address": {{ $('Parse AI Response').item.json.property_address ? JSON.stringify($('Parse AI Response').item.json.property_address) : 'null' }},
  "source": "{{ $('Parse AI Response').item.json.source || 'Email' }}",
  "ai_draft": {{ JSON.stringify($json.text || $json.message?.content || '') }}
}
